attributes.action: Listen to the lecturers strikes in Scotland so students can have an education
attributes.additional_details: To take into consideration the pay that they give teachers/lecturers in Scotland so that they can provide students with the proper education they need and have a healthy educational system.
attributes.background: Listen to the lecturers protests and take them into consideration for the benefit of young peoples education and help the future economy lead by this generations education.

rejection.details:
The Scottish Government is responsible for education in Scotland. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
